title: Trainsignal - Microsoft Network Monitoring
description:
Trainsignal - Microsoft Network Monitoring

In this course on Microsoft Network Monitoring you will learn to capture and analyze network data in real-time. This course also covers how to make sense of your network data and effectively troubleshoot your network's traffic.

Lesson 0: Getting Started with Microsoft Network Monitoring Training Course
Lesson 1: Lab Setup
Lesson 2: The Course Scenario
Lesson 3: Introduction: Meet Network Monitor
Lesson 4: Getting to Know Network Monitor
Lesson 5: Making Sense of Your Data
Lesson 6: Core Protocols
Lesson 7: Practical Troubleshooting of DHCP
Lesson 8: The Big Daddy of Network Protocols: Domain Name Services (DNS)
Lesson 9: Advanced Features of DNS
Lesson 10: Miscellaneous Network Monitor Features

Instructor: Rhonda Layfield

http://www.trainsignal.com/course/36/microsoft-network-monitoring" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
